info.name: Google for Widescreens and 21x9
info.description: A responsive restyle, from 1300px to 2560+ (no limit), centering the searchbar and the results, and doing a few minor adaptations (typo size, colours).
info.additionalInfo:
- Some minor bugs can occurs, do to technical difficulties with the Google's messy sourcecode and badly named ID/classes. Only the "shopping" page seems problematic for now.
- Searchbar is centered (approximatively), same for the toolbar.
- Search results are enlarged but not centered up to 2249px.
- At 2250px, the search result are centered.
- Result colours have been beautified with the colours of the Google logo.
